title: Allen wins first game since 2012
text: Allen wins first game since 2012 Comment Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 10:34 PM Updated at 11:08 PM Posted Oct. 23, 2015 at 10:34 PM Updated at 11:08 PM William Allen 28, ES South 27 Game played at East Stroudsburg South High School Leading rushers: ES South, Jared Alphonso - 7 carries for 33 yards. Allen, Christian Suarez - 18 carries for 100 yards. Leading passers: ESS, Jake Cirillo - 14-18, 247 yards and 2 TDs, 1 INT. Allen, Romeo Wright 8-12, 98 yards and 1 TD. Leading receivers: ESS, Gage Scott - 5 catches for 113 yards. Allen, Felix Alvarez - 3-58, 1 TD. Play of the game: Cirillo was intercepted with 2 minutes left in the fourth quarter to seal a victory for Allen. Key stat: ES South turned the ball over twice. Notes: 79-yard kickoff return for a touchdown by Changa Hodge brought the Cavs back into the game. Allen broke a 28-game losing streak. Last win came in 2012 against PM East. Next week: Friday, Oct. 30 - Dieruff at ES South, 7 p.m. - Ryan Laroco
